Top Hotel Collections Salt Lake City Hotels Resorts Near Kolkata Airport View All Hotels In Kolkata Romantic Places Near Kolkata We, the people of Kolkata love holidays. And love. Moreover, when we are served up the perfect cocktail of love and a long weekend, we love the idea of going away to explore our beautiful world. Holi (Read More)dify.com feels the same way! So we bring to our junta of Kolkata a collection of romantic getaways from Kolkata this Valentine’s to pep up your romance in the picturesque Eastern locales of our country. Read on… Here is the list of 10 Romantic Places Near Kolkata To Visit This Valentines Day 1. Sunderbans: Romantic Destination to Visit near Kolkata 4.7 /5 View 34+ photos Known For : Marichjhanpi Ghoramara Island New Moore Island The estuaries, the mangrove forests, the Royal Bengal Tiger and the whole essence of the Sundarbans is sure to leave a mark on your love life from here on out. There’s a bunch of exploration to be done, beautiful and rare sights to be seen and a lot of romance to be had. The endearing simplicity of the Gangetic plains and the vast variety of flora and wildlife here will sure stay in your hearts for a long, long time. Best Time: September to March 3 Sundarbans Attractions View Hotels Read More 2. Puri, Odisha 4.3 /5 View 38+ photos Known For : Raghurajpur Artist Village Sri Jagannath Puri Temple Puri Beach Markandeswara Temple One of the finest beach destinations on the Eastern side, Puri happens to be one of the most romantic getaways from Kolkata ever. Coupled with the awesome weather that Eastern India sees during Valentine’s, a beach destination like this will help you kindle your fire. Walk around the lovely golden beaches hand-in-hand, eat some great food together, splash in the Bay of Bengal, indulge yourselves with some spa services and explore the quaint tranquillity of the beach town. Distance from Kolkata: 496 km Best Time: July to March 29 Puri Attractions View Packages Read More 3. Kurseong: Offbeat Romantic Holiday near Kolkata 4.1 /5 View 17+ photos Known For : Netaji Subash Chandra Bose Museum Ambotia Shiva Mandir Tea Gardens in Kurseong Kurseong, the Land of White Orchids, the offbeat alternative to Darjeeling, is one place to go to if you want a romantic holiday with your significant other. The overall calm and mystic beauty of this lovely hill town, coupled with waterfalls, flowers on hill slopes and the gompas will leave you both reminiscing about this Valentine’s for years to come. Distance from Kolkata: 588 km Best Time: April to May, August to October 9 Kurseong Attractions View Hotels Read More 4. Dooars, Assam: A long-standing affair with tea! 4.8 /5 View 12+ photos Known For : Mahanada Wildlife Sanctuary Sumsing and Suntalekhola Chapramari Wildlife Sanctuary The tea-estate of North East India, Dooars is a beautiful hilly romantic getaway from Kolkata to surprise your Valentine pleasantly. The beautiful geographical relief system that the Dooars enjoy can scarcely be found elsewhere. Set amidst the deep woods, the vegetation, the flora and fauna, the tea gardens and the meandering rivers, the Dooars is a beauty too great to behold, and a love song to remember. Distance from Kolkata: 670 km Best Time: Throughout the year 4 Dooars Attractions View Hotels Read More Top Hotels In Kolkata Search Hotels Hotels In Salt Lake City Kolkata 16 options from ₹ 972 onwards Best Resorts Near Kolkata For Weekend Getaways 18 options from ₹ 2,200 onwards Best Resorts Near Kolkata 39 options from ₹ 2,200 onwards Hotels Near Kolkata Airport 50 options from ₹ 1,019 onwards 5-Star Hotels in Kolkata for a Perfect Stay 21 options from ₹ 4,780 onwards Best Hotels in Kolkata 37 options from ₹ 2,500 onwards View All Hotels In Kolkata View All Hotels In Kolkata 5. Darjeeling: The Quintessential Romantic Getaway from Kolkata! 4.8 /5 View 50+ photos Known For : Darjeeling Himalayan Railway Darjeeling Peace Pagoda Himalayan Mountaineering Institute Darjeeling has been a favourite haunt for honeymoons and romantic getaways from Kolkata for generations! The tea, the food, the treks, the sunset over the Kanchenjungha, the toy train, the magical Tiger Hill, all get together and make for a holiday that you’ll love to take with intertwined fingers. If you both have a thing for adventures, go on to the Sandakphu and Phalut Treks for an awesome memory that you’ll cherish as a couple. Distance from Kolkata: 616 km Best Time: February to March, September to December 31 Darjeeling Attractions View Packages Read More 6. Talasari Beach 4.6 /5 View 6+ photos 10 kilometres away from the perennially crowded Digha and yet in a world of its own, Talasari Beach is a beautiful hidden beach destination to go to if you just want to spend some time by yourselves. The calmness of this romantic getaway from Kolkata will help you rediscover the magic that’s so often lost in the daily grind of our city lives. Distance from Kolkata: 190 km Best Time: October to December, February 1 Talasari Beach Attractions View Hotels Read More 7. Gangtok 4.6 /5 View 28+ photos Known For : Nathula Pass MG Marg Rumtek Monastery One of the prettiest hill stations in the country, with equal doses of vibrant culture and a punch of many, many traditions, this is a lovely holiday to take in the Eastern Himalayas. With several beautiful viewpoints and great locales within a manageable distance, this one is a great holiday to take as one of the romantic getaways from Kolkata. Distance from Kolkata: 671 km Best Time: Throughout the year 34 Gangtok Attractions View Packages Read More 8. Raichak: Luxury romantic getaway from Kolkata 4.4 /5 View 5+ photos Known For : The F fort Diamond Harbour Lighthouse at Diamond Harbour A small town located on the banks of the Hooghly river, Raichak is a serene, peaceful town which has become one of the popular romantic getaways for the people of Kolkata. The picturesque views of the river, the soothing boat rides and the Raichak fort (now a heritage hotel) are some of the main attractions of this place and are more than enough for you to plan a trip to this place with your significant other. Distance from Kolkata: 52 km Best Time: October to March 8 Raichak Attractions View Hotels Read More 9. Digha 4.5 /5 View 24+ photos Known For : Marine Station/Aquarium of Zoological Survey of India New Digha Beach Udaipur Beach Widely known as the most popular sea resort for the Kolkata peeps, Digha is a perfect romantic getaway from Kolkata. Its gentle, rolling waves clubbed with the Casuarina trees along the beach only add to the beauty and charm of this place. Take a walk on the beach with your loved one and enjoy the sunrise and sunset. It can’t get more romantic this, can it? Distance from Kolkata: 180 km Best Time: July to March 9 Digha Attractions View Hotels Read More 10. Mandarmani Beach, Shankarpur 4.1 /5 View 10+ photos Mandarmani is slowly emerging as one of the most important beach resorts in West Bengal. Not very far from Kolkata, this place is known for being one of the few motorable beaches in the country. The beach is clean and calm, and the waters are great for swimming, a contrast to the beach at Digha. Being less crowded and cleaner, add this place to your list of must-visit romantic getaways from Kolkata. Distance from Kolkata: 174 km Read More So what are you waiting for? Pack your bags and get ready to enjoy the perfect romantic vacation.
